verbose_text: As shown in Figure XREF_FIG, helicase interaction with viral RNA induces the recruitment of downstream effector molecules including interferon promoter stimulator (IPS) -1 (also known as VISA, Cardif, or MAVS), TNF receptor associated factor (TRAF) 3, and perhaps stimulator of interferon genes, leading to the activation of mitogen activated protein (MAP) kinases, and the IkappaB kinase (IKK)-related kinases, TRAF family member associated NF-kappaB activator (TANK) binding kinase 1 and IKK-I.
